title: K3s Cluster Configuration Values
description: Values for configuring a K3s cluster, assuming Terraform provisions underlying VMs and installs K3s.

k3s_version.description: Desired K3s version (e.g., v1.27.7+k3s1). Check K3s GitHub releases.

server_instance_type.description: Instance type for server nodes (cloud provider specific, e.g., t3.medium for AWS). TODO: Update if TF module creates VMs.

server_image_id.description: Image ID for server nodes (cloud provider specific, e.g., an AMI ID for AWS). TODO: Update if TF module creates VMs.

agent_instance_type.description: Instance type for agent nodes (cloud provider specific). TODO: Update if TF module creates VMs.

agent_image_id.description: Image ID for agent nodes (cloud provider specific). TODO: Update if TF module creates VMs.

ssh_user.description: SSH username for connecting to provisioned VMs. TODO: Update if needed.

ssh_private_key_pem.description: SSH private key (PEM format) for VM access. IMPORTANT: Sourced from K8s secret (see values.yaml). Value here is placeholder. TODO: Ensure secret exists or adapt TF module.

vpc_id.description: VPC ID for network configuration (cloud provider specific). TODO: Update if TF module manages networking.

subnet_ids.description: Subnet IDs for network configuration (cloud provider specific). TODO: Update if TF module manages networking.

k3s_server_install_flags.description: Additional flags for K3s server installation script (e.g., '--disable traefik --tls-san YOUR_IP_OR_DNS').

k3s_agent_install_flags.description: Additional flags for K3s agent installation script (e.g., '--node-label role=agent').

k3s_token.description: K3s join token. If not provided, TF module might auto-generate. TODO: Set if specific token needed.

datastore_endpoint.description: External datastore endpoint for K3s HA (e.g., 'etcd://...' or 'mysql://...'). TODO: Configure if using external datastore.

resource_tags.description: Tags for underlying cloud resources. TODO: Update cost_center.
